divs: Sighting DetailsAT STOP LIGHT THOUGHT THAT I WAS SEEING THE FIRST STAR OF THE NIGHT. IT WAS STATIONARY. THEN IT MOVED RIGHT AT ME. IT TRAVELED RIGHT AT ME THEN MAD A RIGHT HAND TURN AND DISSAPPERED IN TO THE TREES COULD NOT SEE A SHAPE NO BECON LIGHTS TO SIGNAL AIRCRAFT FAMILY OF AVIATORS NOT ME, BUT KNOW HELOCPTERS, JETS, AND PLANES. LIGHT WAS LIKE A STAR I KNOW A SATLLITE COULD NOT MAKE SUCH AN ABRUPT TURN. CAME FROM THE WEST THEN WENT NORTH 1- 2MIN DURATION ON PHONE WITH WIFE SHE DOESNT RECALL CONVERSATION, BUT WHEN EXPLAINING WHAT I WAS SEEING IN THE SKY SHE GOT VERY UPSET. AT LIGHT AT GASKINS RD AND QUACCISON RD GOING WEST BOUND, ON MY WAY HOME FROM WORK(I AM A RESPIRATORY THEROPIST. I WAS VERY MIXED WITH EMOTION. WAS JUST BELOW THE OVERCAST SKY ONLY LOST SIGHT WHEN VEIW WAS OBSTRUCTED BY TREES RED LIGHT KEPT ME FROM EXPLORING IT OUT MORE
trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Richmond

Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
Summary: Cloudy sunset thought it was a star at first. Total overcast.
